text: Na'ankure nagra antahi'noe, tamagu'amo otigeta zamaza hunaku retro'ma hu'nazana, Masedonia mono vahe, musezampinti zamasami'na amanage huno'e, ko'ma evia kafufina Griki kaziga Akaia kumate nemaniza vahe'mo'za, Juda vahe zamaza hu'naku ko retro hu'naze hu'na tamagriku zamasmi'noge'za, nentahiza zmagu'amo otige'za hakare vahe'mo'za anahukna huta zamigahune hu'naze.
